A mistake? You started the thing, got ot over a quarter done then stopped. Stopping the torrent was your mistake?

You can always re-start it, right? In other words, repeat whatever action you took at first. The hard part now is remembering what it was.

How hard is it to restart a damn torrent? It's been sitting here for 12 god damn days.

If you don't know what you're doing then don't do it.
